Title: Punjab farmers opt for paddy over cotton
Content: Farmers of Punjab, where a massive whitefly attack occurred last year, have opted for paddy this year and about 30.10-lakh hectares has been sown during the ongoing kharif season.Decline in cotton acr
Author: PTI
Description: Farmers of Punjab, where a massive whitefly attack occurred last year, have opted for paddy this year and about 30.10-lakh hectares has been sown during the ongoing kharif season.Decline in cotton acr
